text: Amir Tizrou is an Iranian Football Forward who currently plays for Iranian football club Sepidrood Rasht S.C. as a defender in the Azadegan League.http://www.varzesh3.com/news/1294505/%D8%A8%D8%A7%D8%B2%DB%8C%DA%A9%D9%86-%D8%B3%DB%8C%D8%A7%D9%87-%D8%AC%D8%A7%D9%85%DA%AF%D8%A7%D9%86-%D8%B1%D8%A7%D9%87%DB%8C-%D9%85%D8%A7%D8%B4%DB%8C%D9%86%E2%80%8C%D8%B3%D8%A7%D8%B2%DB%8C-%D8%B4%D8%AF https://int.soccerway.com/players/amir-tizro/267362/ ==References== Category:Damash Gilan players Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Siah Jamegan players Category:Machine Sazi F.C. players Category:Iranian footballers Category:Association football defenders
